casebody.data:
No. 10-202. Gary N. Weintraub, Administrator of the Estate of David H. Weintraub, Petitioner v. Board of Education of the City School District of the City of New York, et al. 562 U.S. 995, 131 S. Ct. 444,

178 L. Ed. 2d 344,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8218. October 18, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 593 F.3d 196.
